org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page

Class PageScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.PageScrollView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageSyncManager.PageSyncListener, DocumentImageListener, MouseScrollPanel.MouseHandlerExtension, SelectionManager.SelectionListener

    public class PageScrollView
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentImageListener, PageSyncManager.PageSyncListener, SelectionManager.SelectionListener, MouseScrollPanel.MouseHandlerExtension
    View for displaying and interacting with a document page. Uses a MouseScrollPanel as panel.
    Author:
    clc

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageScrollView

        public PageScrollView(PageLayoutC pageLayout,
                      DocumentImageSource imageSource,
                      SelectionManager selectionManager,
                      boolean enableMouseWheelScrolling,
                      boolean useSmoothZoomByDefault)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        pageLayout - Page layout to display
        imageSource - Document image source
        selectionManager - Content object selection manager to listen to
        enableMouseWheelScrolling - If set to true the mouse wheel is used for scrolling up and down, otherwise it is used for zooming
        useSmoothZoomByDefault - If set to true the zoom is changed smoothly using a timer, otherwise the zoom is changed immediately.

        public void zoomToFit(int width,
                      int height,
                      boolean zoomOutOnly)
        Changes the zoom factor to fit an object of the given size.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the object to fit
        height - Height of the object to fit
        zoomOutOnly - If set to true the zoom factor will not be increased, only decreased (if needed).
